lead_paragraph: Donald Trump is a master manipulator, and the news media has found itself at the edge of a cliff. It needs better footing, fast.
snippet: Donald Trump is a master manipulator, and the news media has found itself at the edge of a cliff. It needs better footing, fast....

headline.main: As Trump Berates News Media, a New Strategy Is Needed to Cover Him
headline.print_headline: Outgunned, Outmaneuvered and in Need of a Game Plan
